sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../Styles/tours-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import { useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' const ToursDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams () const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour; const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews); const options = { day: 'numeric', month: 'long', year: 'numeric' }; return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not rated" ) : ( ({reviews?.length} đánh giá) )} {address}
{city} {price} vnđ / khách {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize} người
Giới thiệu địa điểm du lịch

{desc}

{/* ============= tour reviews section =============== */}

Đánh giá ({reviews?.length})

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(review => (
muhib

{new Date("09-06-2025").toLocaleDateString("vi-VN", options)}

5
Chất lượng dịch vụ tốt

{review.comment}

)) }
{/* ============= tour reviews section end =============== */}
) } export default ToursDetails
